00012 ##
00013 # I am not smart enough to properly subclass Wax's DIalog class in the manner that
00014 # I would like.  As a result, pyp_gui_graphs contains a subclass of Dialog for each
00015 # type of graph that pyp_gui can draw.
00016 ##
00017 
00018 import wx
00019 #from PyPedal import pyp_gui
00020 #from PyPedal import pyp_gui_metrics
00021 #from PyPedal import pyp_gui_utils

00032 ##
00033 # The PyPedalGraphDialogInbreeding() class provides the dialogue box used
00034 # to display the "inbreeding by birthyear" graph.
00035 class PyPedalGraphDialogInbreeding(wx.Dialog):
00036     def Body(self):
00037         print 'In PyPedalGraphDialogInbreeding.Body()'
00038         print '\tCalling wx.InitAllImageHandlers()'
00039         wx.InitAllImageHandlers()
00040         print '\tCalling wx.Image()'
00041         _i = wx.Image('_coi_by_year.png', wx.BITMAP_TYPE_PNG)
00042         print '\tCalling wx.BitmapFromImage()'
00043         _b = wx.BitmapFromImage(_i)
00044         print '\tCalling wx.StaticBitmap()'
00045         _sb = wx.StaticBitmap(self, -1, _b, (10, 10), (_b.GetWidth(), _b.GetHeight()))
00046         #wx.StaticBitmap(panel, -1, bmp, (10, pos), (bmp.GetWidth(), bmp.GetHeight()))
00047         self.AddComponent(_sb)
00048         self.Pack()
00049
